50.$description: Neutral 50 canvas background for light theme.

200.$description: Neutral 200 subtle surface and soft border tone.

300.$description: Accent border aligned to primary default.

400.$description: Accent hover derived from primary hover.

500.$description: Accent text aligned to pressed state.

compact.$description: Compact vertical spacing for dense layouts.
Compact padding for tight surface layouts.

raised.$description: Raised card surface with soft separation.

backdrop.$description: Backdrop and scrim tone for overlays.

outer.$description: Outer halo colour for focus indicators.

inner.$description: Inner ring contrast colour for focus.

compact.$description: Compact vertical spacing for tight stacks.

raised.$description: Raised panel surface for dark theme.

subtle.$description: Secondary panel surface tone for dark theme.

disabled.$description: Disabled component surface in dark theme.

backdrop.$description: Backdrop and scrim tone for dark theme overlays.

inverse.$description: Inverse surface token for dark contexts.

default.$description: Primary interactive default surface for dark theme.

hover.$description: Primary interactive hover surface for dark theme.

pressed.$description: Primary interactive pressed surface for dark theme.

subtle.$description: Subtle border tone for dark theme.

strong.$description: High contrast border tone for dark theme.

muted.$description: Muted caption text on dark surfaces.

inverse.$description: Inverse text colour for dark theme.

on_interactive.$description: Icons on interactive surfaces for dark theme.

outer.$description: Outer focus ring for dark surfaces.

inner.$description: Inner focus ring contrast for dark theme.

width.$description: Default focus ring width for dark theme.

default.$description: Dark theme inherits default stack spacing.

compact.$description: Dark theme inherits compact stack spacing.

default.$description: Dark theme inherits default inset spacing.

compact.$description: Dark theme inherits compact inset spacing.

xs.$description: Dark theme inherits extra-small inline spacing.

sm.$description: Dark theme inherits small inline spacing.

canvas.$description: System canvas surface derived from theme.

raised.$description: System raised surface derived from theme.

subtle.$description: System subtle surface derived from theme.

disabled.$description: System disabled surface derived from theme.

on_interactive.$description: System text colour for interactive surfaces.
System icon colour on interactive surfaces.

accent.$description: Communication accent tone for unread and emphasis states.

muted.$description: Communication metadata foreground and helper tone.

success.$description: Communication success tone for delivery health.

error.$description: Communication error tone for delivery failures.

policy-editor-border.$description: Border tone for policy editor sections.

default.$description: Default single column layout for all contexts

two-column-standard.$description: Two-column layout with standard rail (detail view)

two-column-narrow.$description: Two-column layout with narrow rail (list view)

two-column-guidance.$description: Two-column layout with wider main and guidance rail (form view)

standard.$description: Standard rail width for detail view context panels

narrow.$description: Narrow rail width for list/form filter panels

thin.$description: Default border thickness for view surfaces

medium.$description: Emphasized border thickness for high-contrast surfaces

strong.$description: Strong border thickness for card focus treatments

max-width.$description: Maximum width constraint for view content

gap.$description: Gap between cards or card sections

detail.$description: Gap between body sections in detail view

list.$description: Gap between body sections in list view

form.$description: Gap between body sections in form view

timeline.$description: Gap between body sections in timeline view

gap.$description: Internal gap within page header region

card-gap.$description: Gap within page header card surface

default.$description: Default gap for main region content

list.$description: Gap for list view main content

inline.$description: Gap for inline view main content

future.description: Subscription is scheduled but not yet active.

trialing.description: Subscription is in a trial period before billing begins.

active.description: Subscription is paid and service is provisioned.

paused.description: Billing paused temporarily by finance or customer request.

pending_cancellation.description: Subscription will cancel at period end but remains active now.

delinquent.description: Renewal payment failed; collection retries in progress.

terminated.description: Subscription ended; service access revoked and billing stopped.

draft.description: Invoice is editable and not yet finalized.

posted.description: Invoice finalized with terms before collection.

past_due.description: Invoice is unpaid past its due date.

void.description: Invoice canceled and no longer payable.
